section.section: After each special session, the Department shall compile and index the laws that are enacted during that session.

After completion of the compilation and index, the Department shall deliver copies of the laws, executive orders adopted pursuant to Article II, § 24 of the Maryland Constitution, certificates, and titles to the printer who is designated to print the session laws.

The printer shall print promptly:
the documents delivered under this section; and
with the compilation for a regular session, the statement of receipts and expenditures of public money delivered under § 2-103 of the State Finance and Procurement Article.
The printer shall deliver the volumes to the Executive Director.
The Department shall publish other executive orders delivered to it in accordance with § 3-406(b) of this article.

text.section:
The Department shall:
create and maintain, in the form of a statutory database, a code comprising the public general laws of the State; and
maintain the structural integrity and textual accuracy of that code.
